Uses of Class
valerioFarriciello.Model.Manager

  • Packages that use Manager 
    Package Description
    valerioFarriciello.Controller  
    valerioFarriciello.Model  

    • Uses of Manager in valerioFarriciello.Controller

      Methods in valerioFarriciello.Controller that return types with arguments of type Manager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Manager> League.getAllTheManagers() 
      Methods in valerioFarriciello.Controller with parameters of type Manager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean League.assignManagerToATeam(Manager manager, Team team)
      Responsible to validate the manager assignment for the team.
      void League.deleteManager(Manager managerToDelete)
      It will take a manager object that has been selected from the VIEW components and checks if he/she is in a team.
      If the team is present, then both the managerID and playerID will be passed to the database object in order
      to delete the instance of the manager and set the value managerID inside the team table to null.
      void League.removeManagerFromTheTeam(Manager manager, boolean refreshDB)
      Checks if the manager is in the team already, if it is the case the database object will be called
      and it will remove the manager from the team.
      The reason why this is an option is that we don't always want to refresh the database immediately, since
      this method will be called anyway right after a new assignment, therefore it will be a waste of time
      refreshing the database twice after a few milliseconds

      Methods in valerioFarriciello.Model that return types with arguments of type Manager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Manager> Database.getAllTheManagers()
      Retrieves all the instances of Manager inside the database
      java.util.ArrayList<Manager> Database.queryManagersByName(java.lang.String name)
      It queries all the managers that have the parameter that has been passed in their firstName, middleName or lastName
      Methods in valerioFarriciello.Model with parameters of type Manager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Team.addManager(Manager newManager)
      Sets the manager pointer to the new manager object and the team pointer (inside the Manager class)
      pointing at THIS team.
      void Database.createAManager(Manager newManager)
      Adds a new instance of manager inside the database
      void Team.setManager(Manager manager)
